name: Advertisement for Director/Finance in Punjab State Power Corporation Limited

Eligibility Criteria.Basic Qualification: Basic Chartered Accountant or Cost Accountant (ICWA)
Eligibility Criteria.Age Limit: Minimum age 50 years at the time of appointment
Eligibility Criteria.Experience Requirements: At least twenty-five (25) years of experience in Finance/Accounts

Appointment Process.Application Submission: Applications, neatly typed in English and duly signed, along with copies of certificates/documents as proof of age, essential qualifications, and experience in the prescribed format
Appointment Process.Selection Process: Based on merit and preference for candidates having worked in a position equivalent to SE/CE in Regulatory Affairs and Commercial matters

Tenure.Appointment Period: Initially for a period of two years which can be further extended for three more years
Tenure.Disqualification: Disqualified if not been disqualified under Section 164 or any other relevant sections of the Indian Companies Act, 2013

details.post: The post of Director is open for applicants from the Public Sector Enterprise (PSE), Central Government, Armed Forces of the Union, and All India Services.
details.eligibility: Applicants must have a degree in engineering or technology from a recognized university and have at least 25 years of experience in a managerial or executive position.
